Thisis theroyal burial siteofMpezeni 1 (Ntutu Jere) who was the son of
Zwangendaba,afamousgreatwarriorandKingoftheNgonipeople,abreakaway
fromtheNdwandweunderZwideConfederacy,afteritsdefeatatthehandsof
ShakaZuluofthe ZuluKingdominpresentdaySouthAfrica.Theburialsite
providesevidenceof thepresenceand expansion oftheNgoniKingdominto

theNgoniKingdominnorth-eastZambiainthemid1880s.
Mpezeni’sfather,Zwangendaba crossedtheZambeziaround1835nearFeira
(nowLuangwa)aroundthetimewhentherewasaneclipseandarguably,diedin
thenorthernpartofZambiabetweentheZambianandTanzanianborderregion.
After the death of Zwangendaba, the Ngoni split into different groups with
Mpezeni’sJereNgonisettlinginpresentdayeasternpartofZambia.
